pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 24  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)7 on easy, 13 on normal, 19 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Woodland Mansions, Raids $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)A $(thing)Vindicator$() is an illager equipped with an $(item)Iron Axe$().
